mapper.insert: insert into student(st_grade, st_class, st_num, st_name) values(#{std.st_grade},#{std.st_class},#{std.st_num},#{std.st_name})
mapper.update: update student set st_grade = #{new.st_grade}, st_class = #{new.st_class}, st_num = #{new.st_num}, st_name = #{new.st_name} where st_key = #{new.st_key}
